snippet: The Bombers have long observed a strict Steinbrenner-era grooming code. But as other teams relax their own rules, is there room for a man bun in the Bronx?...

headline.main: Rescue Helicopter Crashes in Central Japan; At Least 3 Dead
headline.print_headline: Rescue Helicopter Crashes in Central Japan; At Least 3 Dead

lead_paragraph: The Bombers have long observed a strict Steinbrenner-era grooming code. But as other teams relax their own rules, is there room for a man bun in the Bronx?
